OK here I go again

starting with 11998

Lunarpine smiles, pleased with his marksmanship when he sees 
Serpentor turn and fire, Lunarpine drops to the ground as the blast 
sails over him into a large tree, with a loud crash the tree fell 
down atop the wolfbot temrorarily pinning him to the ground.

12002
The wolfbot rolls as much as possible trying to free himself, he 
smells Shadow Wings scent not very far away along with the 
continueing weaponsfire.

12005 He pushes at the tree, trying to move it off him when he hears 
Wings screem of pain.

12023
Lunarpine forces the tree offhis body enough to roll over onto his 
back. he has more trouble than usual seeing the action, The claws on 
his right arm extend and slash through the tree freeing him from his 
confines. He stands ready for almost anything and what he saw was the 
only thing he wasn't prepared for.

12028
Serpentor stood over Lunarpines love with his foot on her as if she 
were some trophy. Lunarpine raised his weapon to Serpentor.

12034 Lunarpine charges downhill fireing at Serpentor as he goes.
"Leave her be, her Spark doesn't belong to you, it's mine to do with 
as I please, And I say it  lives."
The wolfbots yell echoes through the battlefield as an unpreventable 
rage consumes him.
